chapter.text: Did you notice it? ^1500It’s hard to miss. ^1500My beautiful creations always get taken. ^1500Misconstrued. ^1500Misused. ^1500Degraded. ^1500You see, I have no way of preserving them here. ^1500Which is my fault, after all. ^1500My curse. ^1500Everything always becomes something else, it’s just how it all works here. ^1500It’s been an eternity of remembering things how they once were and never really understanding what they are now. ^1500I envy you for that reason.
